name: Cthulhu Must Die
description:
Invoke the wrath of Cthulhu, and embark on a desperate quest to hunt down and vanquish the ancient cosmic entity before the final ritual seals its invincibility!

Cthulhu Must Die is an action-roguelike infused with investigation and survival elements, where your choices shape your strength and determine your ability to track and confront Cthulhu.

Engage in intense battles against hordes of Cthulhu's minions, while keeping a watchful eye on the ticking clock of the ritual's progression.

Key Features

  • Unearth clues from scattered notes and follow map signs to pinpoint Cthulhu's elusive whereabouts.
  • Engage in fast-paced runs of 20 minutes or less, testing your agility and wit.
  • Masterfully wield manual weapons to aim and shoot with precision, including holy books, scalpels, and an arsenal of upcoming additions.
  • Customize your runs with unique characters (with more on the way) that offer distinct abilities and playstyles.
  • Choose from a wide array of weapons, ranging from sound-based weaponry to forthcoming additions, ensuring varied combat experiences.
  • Discover an abundance of upgrades that grant each run a distinct flavor, with even more enhancements on the horizon.
  • Seamlessly switch between keyboard and gamepad for enhanced control and comfort.



As the world teeters on the brink of damnation, only you possess the power to deliver it from eternal torment. Uncover the secrets, face your fears, and slay Cthulhu before all hope is lost!
